snippet.title: Super Sami Roll 2 - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Sami Roll 2 is now in development!

Get excited for the follow-up to the charming and unique "rolling platformer" Super Sami Roll.
Improved graphics, more playable characters, beautiful envionments, tons of fun mechanics, plenty of accessibility options so everybody has a great time, and much more!
Evader Music is also back for an amazing upbeat soundtrack!

Wishlist it now on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2798320

Follow us on Kickstarter as we prepare for a campaign with awesome rewards:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/sonzaigames/super-sami-roll-2

Check out Twitter/X for updates:
https://twitter.com/SuperSamiRoll
https://twitter.com/SonzaiGames

Join us in the game's Discord server if you have any question or comment:
https://discord.gg/UjqssfJK5U

Also the official Sonzai Games Discord:
https://discord.gg/WfbSsv4DUE
